markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Goz Mask](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2348)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 73</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn mask

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Originally designed by a sect of [Gozren](/Deities.aspx?ID=8) priests, _goz masks_ were designed to help navigate the area around the Eye of Abendego. The masks couldn't contend with the might of the storm, but people all around the Mwangi Expanse still use them. These masks are typically made of wood and sport round, exaggerated features.

<document level="2" id="action-1900" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goz Mask
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 6"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goz Mask (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 240 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The effect lasts for 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Goz Mask (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Pathfinder #169: Kindled Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=94) pg. 73</row>

**Price** 1,900 gp

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

The mask gives you [darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) and allows you to ignore all concealment from any environmental effects for 1 hour.
name: Goz Mask
